Description: Like Magdon Music on Facebook! For your review and consideration- we present you with another fine Epiphone Guitar from the guitar collection at Magdon Music! Please read the description below and review the photos. The exact guitar pictured and in the description is the exact guitar that you will be bidding on. If there is something that you need to know that is not in this description- please contact us at Magdon Music before bidding and we will be very happy to assist! *** Please note that our guitars are tech inspected before they go out the door! Buy with confidence from Magdon Music! ***Free shipping is for the Continental USA (lower 48 only!) If you live outside of this area- please contact us for your ship rate. Pictured here we have a super nice 2018 Epiphone Les Paul Tribute Plus Solid Body Electric Guitar in Black Cherry. This guitar comes with its original Epiphone Hard Guitar Case. Both the guitar and the case are in brand new condition. They are actually new floor models. The finish on this guitar is just gorgeous and it has beautiful quilted flame (which is hard to capture in photos.) ***Free shipping is for USA ONLY! (Lower 48 only!)
